about_the_game:
Large Cargo

The new DLC is all about the Large Cargo. Moving an 85' XLED TV or Large Sofa to your client certainly takes dedication. And a specific large-size vehicle! Invest in a new fleet and enjoy the lucrative contracts coming your way.

Delivery Assistant

It’s not easy for a single driver to move couches and other large cargo around on their own. Hire an additional Delivery Assistant for your vehicles. Enjoy the drastically reduced loading/unloading times for moving large cargo.

Stockholm, Sweden - New Scenario

Mr. Kamprad owns a large appliance and furniture store named "Ineeda". Help him transport large deliveries to his customers. These large items like refrigerators, couches, and washing machines are going to need some special vehicles. Enjoy the story, complete a new set of objectives, and prove that you are the best business partner that "Ineeda" could have imagined.

Key Features:

  • New Campaign Scenario - Stockholm, Sweden
  • 20 New Large Cargo Deals
  • 6 New Vehicles - Pickup, Lorry, Box Truck, Cargo Bike, Cargo Car
  • Cargo Van Vehicle Update
  • 2 New Driver Traits
  • 2 New Vehicle Upgrades
  • New Set of Achievements
  • Delivery Assistants

name: Delivery INC - Large Cargo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz, multi-core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050

short_description: Expand your fleet with trucks and conquer the large cargo market. Pursue new lucrative contracts, hire delivery assistants, and enjoy a new campaign scenario taking place in Stockholm, Sweden. Large Cargo is coming!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Slovak, Czech
*languages with full audio support
